caption.p: Transcriptome-wide m6A-Seq revealed global m6A modification patterns in MH7A cells after stimulation with TNF-α. ( A) Venn diagram of m6A modified genes in the control group and the TNF-α group. ( B) The distribution patterns of m6A peaks in different chromosomes. ( C) The number of m6A peaks in per chromosome. ( D) The number of m6A peaks in each group. ( E), Violin plot of the relative abundance of m6A peaks in each group.
